Add a new item to a Notion database with: Add a new item to a Notion database with custom field values and optional content. Ideal for creating tasks, records, or entries in structured databases.
Update specific fields in a Notion datab: Update specific fields in a Notion database item. Perfect for maintaining data, tracking changes, or syncing information across systems.
Searches for an item in database by fiel: Zoekt naar een item in database op basis van veld.
Create a new Notion page as a sub-page w: Create a new Notion page as a sub-page with custom title and content. Perfect for organizing documentation, notes, or creating structured page hierarchies.
Voegt inhoud toe aan het einde van een pagina.
Retrieve the actual content of a page (r: Haal de werkelijke inhoud van een pagina op (weergegeven door blokken).
Archive (soft-delete) a database item wi: Archive (soft-delete) a database item without permanently removing it. Archived items can be restored later if needed.
Restore an archived database item back t: Restore an archived database item back to active status. Perfect for recovering accidentally archived tasks, projects, or records.
Add a comment to any Notion page to star: Add a comment to any Notion page to start discussions, provide feedback, or leave notes for team collaboration.
Get detailed information about a Notion: Get detailed information about a Notion database including all its properties, field types, and configuration. Perfect for building dynamic forms, validation rules, or understanding database schemas.
Retrieve all comments from a Notion page: Retrieve all comments from a Notion page, organized by discussion threads. Perfect for tracking feedback, managing reviews, or monitoring page discussions.
Search for Notion pages by title with fl: Search for Notion pages by title with flexible matching options. Perfect for finding specific pages, building page references, or creating automated workflows based on page discovery.
Make a custom API call to a specific end: Maak een aangepaste API call naar een specifiek eindpunt
Title: Aanspreektitel
Choose the Notion database you want to w: Choose the Notion database you want to work with from your workspace
The content you want to append to your i: De inhoud die je aan je item wilt toevoegen.
Select the item you want to update: Selecteer het item dat u wilt bijwerken
Choose the Notion page you want to work: Choose the Notion page you want to work with. This list shows your 100 most recently edited pages for easy selection.
The content you want to append. You can: De inhoud die je wilt toevoegen. Je kunt de markdown opmaak gebruiken.
Convert Notion JSON blocks to Markdown: Zet JSON blokken om naar Markdown
Choose which archived item to restore fr: Choose which archived item to restore from the selected database
Enter your comment text. Supports plain: Enter your comment text. Supports plain text and will be posted as a new comment thread on the selected page.
Enter the page title or part of the titl: Enter the page title or part of the title you want to search for
Enable this to find pages with exactly t: Enable this to find pages with exactly the same title. Disable for partial matching (finds pages containing your search term).
How many pages to return at most (betwee: How many pages to return at most (between 1 and 100)
Authorization headers are injected autom: Autorisatie headers worden automatisch geïnjecteerd vanuit uw verbinding.
HEAD: HOOFD
Triggers when an item is added to a data: Triggert wanneer een artikel is toegevoegd aan een database.
Triggers when an item is updated in a da: Triggert wanneer een item wordt bijgewerkt in een database.
Triggers whenever someone adds a new com: Triggers whenever someone adds a new comment to a specific Notion page. Perfect for notifications, review workflows, or automated responses to team feedback.
Triggers whenever any page in your Notio: Triggers whenever any page in your Notion workspace is modified or updated. Ideal for syncing content changes, backup processes, or notifying teams about documentation updates.
